entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or light snow beginning in the evening then changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
